mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_gq_fss_fuiou_account_info ( trade_type, business_code, trade_sources, contract_num, batch, batch_foiu_finance, trading_time, transaction_amount, user_account, user_name, in_account, in_user_name, total_money, balance, remark, return_num, state, account_state ) VALUES ( #{tradeType}, #{businessCode}, #{tradeSources}, #{contractNum}, #{batch}, #{batchFoiuFinance}, #{tradingTime}, #{transactionAmount}, #{userAccount}, #{userName}, #{inAccount}, #{inUserName}, #{totalMoney}, #{balance}, #{remark}, #{returnNum}, #{state}, #{accountState} )
